attributes.action: Stop the criteria for IVF on the NHS! We are all human an deserve a chance.
attributes.additional_details: Infertility causes heartache relationship problems and depression! When your told the only way you will be able to have a baby is through ivf but then because your a bigger ladie and have pcos or your partner has a child from a previous relationship your knocked back due to the criteria we all seserve to have a chance to become a family were all human stop this criteria on the nhs amd give people a chance even if its just one go. Infertility hurts!!
attributes.background: People with infertility problems such as Pcos unexplained infertiity etc would love a baby. I have been trying for 6years and cant afford thousands for ivf. Were all human and no matter on what size we are we deserve a chance to become a family. Stop the heartache and give people a chance.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining exactly how you would like the criteria for IVF to be changed.
